mapper.select: SELECT sb.id, sb.start_time as startTime, sb.use_time as useTime, sb.money FROM sharebicycle_bicycle_t sb WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT st.bicycle_num as bicycleNum, st.start_time as startTime, st.initial_address as initialAddress, st.end_address as endAddress, st.use_time as useTime, st.money FROM sharebicycle_bicycle_t st WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT su.id as userId , su.head_photo as headPhoto, su.username as username, su.phone as phone, su.email as email, su.address as address FROM sbike_user_t su WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT w.id FROM sbike_user_t u LEFT JOIN sbike_wallet_t w ON ( u.wallet_id = w.id ) WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.PASSWORD = #{password}
